triples.name: Social influence
triples.relevance: The paper investigates how social influence affects inequality and unpredictability in product success.

triples.name: Experimental economics
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel experimental method by creating an artificial music market to study economic behavior.

triples.name: Economic inequality
triples.relevance: The paper measures and analyzes how social influence increases inequality in product success outcomes.

triples.name: Predictability
triples.relevance: The paper investigates unpredictability of success and shows how social influence increases unpredictability.

triples.name: Bounded rationality
triples.relevance: The paper implicitly addresses bounded rationality as participants make decisions based on limited information about song quality.
